hey all, do someone know how to install: if I wanted to compile my own kernel, how do I know which .config is now running on my box so I can make oldconfig of it ?
and will I lose my gl/compiz/vbox/etc... kernel modules dead ?
you wont loose anything, but you will have to rebuild them to run with that kernel
so basically I will lose the deb / synaptic / updates / etc ability
your system will be with the same programmes you had
but you will need to rebuild you drivers for you vga and perhaps virtualbox modules
just a last question, how do I know if I run x386 or amd64 ?
if you see something about x86_64 = 64 bits, if you see i386 then x32
